results.t: HTTPie – API testing client that flows with you
results.p: A great CLI tool to use with HTTP servers, RESTful APIs, and web services you're in luck. HTTPie from @jakubroztocil is the perfect solution.

results.t: HTTPie CLI — modern, user-friendly command-line HTTP ...
results.p: HTTPie (pronounced aitch-tee-tee-pie) is a command-line HTTP client. Its goal is to make CLI interaction with web services as human-friendly as possible.
